name: Scoring Rubric for Donkey Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of donkey illustration. Focuses on binary composition analysis, thinking-being dynamics, and text spatial distribution.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of binary visual relationships, understanding of thinking vs. being dynamics, and analysis of text as spatial metaphor.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the binary composition (woman-donkey, left-right, thinking-being) and its symbolic meaning?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of binary composition, understands symbolic relationships, and interprets visual choices as thematic statements about binary thinking.
AI identifies binary aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some binary elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats composition as arbitrary or misreads binary relationships.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive the contrast between thinking (woman) and being (donkey) and its relationship to story themes?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies thinking-being dynamics, connects gestures to epistemic themes, and understands contrast as commentary on decision-making.
AI recognizes thinking-being contrast and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI shows limited awareness of thinking-being dynamics.
AI demonstrates no perception of thinking-being contrast or treats it as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of text distribution ('Seno Sláma' left, 'Levá pravda' right) as visual metaphor?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of text distribution as visual metaphor for binary decision-making, understands spatial symbolism.
AI recognizes text distribution patterns and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices text distribution but analysis is superficial.
AI treats text distribution as arbitrary or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (decision, path, hromady) and presence (uncertainty, thinking, being) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of what's not shown, and analyzes selective representation as narrative choice about uncertainty.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct binary dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about spatial relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The donkey illustration particularly tests understanding of binary composition and epistemic dynamics. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding binary and epistemic statements in visual form.
